title: Meta is cutting around 600 roles in AI unit: Report
description: Meta is cutting roughly 600 positions out of the several thousand roles within its Superintelligence Labs artificial intelligence unit, Axios reported on Wednesday.
content:
Meta is cutting roughly 600 positions out of the several thousand roles within its Superintelligence Labs artificial intelligence unit, Axios reported on Wednesday.

title: AI models ace their predictions of India’s monsoon rains
description: About 38m farmers received forecasts generated not by an NWP model, but by ones powered by artificial intelligence (AI) instead.
content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) does its best, using the numerical weather prediction (NWP) models that have been a staple of meteorology for decades. Run on supercomputers, these divide the world into a three-dimensional grid, populate eac... [4555 chars]

title: IBM's slowing cloud growth eclipses upbeat third
description: Slower growth in IBM's cloud segment, housed within its software unit, raised alarm bells across investors betting heavily on Big Blue's ability to benefit more from booming demand for cloud services, as artificial intelligence adoption rises.

title: Microsoft At Heart Of AI Shift: Read Full Text Of Satya Nadella's Annual Letter
description: Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella said the company is at the core of a generational moment in technology as the world adapts to artificial intelligence.
content:
Dear shareholders, colleagues, customers, and partners:
Fifty years after our founding, Microsoft is once again at the heart of a generational moment in technology as we find ourselves in the midst of the AI platform shift. More than any transformati... [16991 chars]

title: Mahabharat: Ek Dharmayudh OTT release: When and where to watch India's first AI-powered mythological series
description: Mahabharat: Ek Dharmayudh will debut on JioHotstar on October 25, 2025. This series is India's first mythological show powered by artificial intelligence. It will reimagine the epic Mahabharat with advanced AI. The show promises immersive visual experiences and lifelike battle sequences. This series merges ancient storytelling with modern technology. It offers a futuristic experience for viewers.

title: Ukraine unveils upgraded sea drone it says can strike anywhere in the Black Sea
description: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukraine's state security service has unveiled an upgraded sea drone it says can now operate anywhere in the Black Sea, carry heavier weapons and use artificial intelligence for targeting.
content:

title: ‘Godfathers of AI’ Warn Superintelligence Could Trigger Human Extinction
description: Pioneers of artificial intelligence have signed a statement warning about its dangers.
content:
The “godfathers” of AI have joined an unlikely mix of royals, politicians, business leaders, and TV personalities in signing a statement urging a ban on developing “superintelligence” over fears it could lead to “potential human extinction.”
